channel.title: Comments on: How To Bypass Internet Censorship
channel.description: I am multiple and various - Tomas A. Krag

item.title: By: Akash
item.dc:creator: Akash
item.description: I've been using Primovpn http://www.clearvpn.net/ for the past 2 years on their dual UK and US plan (switching between the 2 countries is easy simply a click to disconnect from one and connect to the other). They use OpenVPN and I have been able to watch iplayer and netflix without issue from the middle east where I am based. It's very easy to use.
item.content:encoded: I’ve been using Primovpn http://www.clearvpn.net/ for the past 2 years on their dual UK and US plan (switching between the 2 countries is easy simply a click to disconnect from one and connect to the other). They use OpenVPN and I have been able to watch iplayer and netflix without issue from the middle east where I am based. It’s very easy to use.

item.title: By: Frederick Yamoah
item.dc:creator: Frederick Yamoah
item.description: Hello hackers, your-freedom though is working in Ghana, i think we have to work harder and find new tricks to bypass the restrictions that is preventing us from surfing the net. have make some new discovery but i want to try if for a month before pubblishing it, work hard and let surf forever.
item.content:encoded: Hello hackers, your-freedom though is working in Ghana, i think we have to work harder and find new tricks to bypass the restrictions that is preventing us from surfing the net. have make some new discovery but i want to try if for a month before pubblishing it, work hard and let surf forever.
